mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_PRODUCT_TYPE T where 1 = 1 AND T.DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND T.ENTITY_IDCODE = #{user.entityIdcode}
SELECT ID,NAME FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_PRODUCT_TYPE where 1 = 1 AND DEL_FLAG != 'Y'

select ID , NAME , STATUS , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , UPDATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME , TYPE_CODE , USER_IDCODE , ENTITY_IDCODE from TTS_SCLTXXCJ_PRODUCT_TYPE where TYPE_CODE =#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
